channel.title: Homebrew on Lucas Roesler
channel.description: Recent content in Homebrew on Lucas Roesler

item.title: Home Brewers Association Ruthless Rye Clone
item.description: This recipe is inspired by the Seirra Nevada Ruthless Rye Clone written up by the Home Brewers Association. I have adjusted it to be a partial mash recipe with about 8 lbs of grains.

item.title: Salt City Brew Supply Orange Honey Wheat
item.description: I just finished my first official “summer beer” of the year, an Orange Honey Wheat. This one was inspire by my wife while at the store “you should do this one, it uses Utah honey!”, thank you tech lady ninja.

item.title: A spring Hefe
item.description: A traditional Bavarian Hefeweizen: medium body, cloudy, malty, and spicy, with a smooth mouth-feel and dense, whipped-cream head.

item.title: Spicy Winter Porter
item.description: I just finished my winter beer. I usually do one dark spicy beer for the winter season. Last year was the “Better Not Pout Stout”, this year is the less excitingly named “Spicy Winter Porter”.
